title: Tawilan
description: Settlement near the village of Tawilan, Jordan, just west of Petra, with archaeological remains from the Iron Age and Persian period. Notably, there is no evidence of Nabataean occupation at this site despite its proximity to Petra.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Tawilan after Bennett 1995.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Tawilan
